name: Pdf417Code
summary: Simple PDF417 helpers with fluent and static APIs.

members.name: Create
members.summary: Starts a fluent PDF417 builder for text payloads.
members.signature: static Pdf417Code.Pdf417Builder Create(string text, Pdf417EncodeOptions encodeOptions, MatrixOptions renderOptions)

members.name: Create
members.summary: Starts a fluent PDF417 builder for byte payloads.
members.signature: static Pdf417Code.Pdf417Builder Create(byte[] data, Pdf417EncodeOptions encodeOptions, MatrixOptions renderOptions)

members.name: Encode
members.summary: Encodes a text payload as PDF417.
members.signature: static BitMatrix Encode(string text, Pdf417EncodeOptions options)

members.name: EncodeBytes
members.summary: Encodes a byte payload as PDF417.
members.signature: static BitMatrix EncodeBytes(byte[] data, Pdf417EncodeOptions options)

members.name: EncodeBytes
members.summary: Encodes a byte payload as PDF417.
members.signature: static BitMatrix EncodeBytes(ReadOnlySpan<byte> data, Pdf417EncodeOptions options)

members.name: Png
members.summary: Renders PDF417 as PNG from bytes.
members.signature: static byte[] Png(ReadOnlySpan<byte> data, Pdf417EncodeOptions encodeOptions, MatrixOptions renderOptions)

members.name: Save
members.summary:
Saves PDF417 to a file for byte payloads based on extension (.png/.svg/.svgz/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.ppm/.pbm/.pgm/.pam/.xbm/.xpm/.tga/.ico/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.
members.signature: static string Save(ReadOnlySpan<byte> data, string path, Pdf417EncodeOptions encodeOptions, MatrixOptions renderOptions, string title)

members.name: SavePng
members.summary: Saves PDF417 PNG to a file.
members.signature: static string SavePng(string text, string path, Pdf417EncodeOptions encodeOptions, MatrixOptions renderOptions)

members.name: SavePng
members.summary: Saves PDF417 PNG to a file for byte payloads.
members.signature: static string SavePng(byte[] data, string path, Pdf417EncodeOptions encodeOptions, MatrixOptions renderOptions)

members.name: SavePng
members.summary: Saves PDF417 PNG to a stream.
members.signature: static void SavePng(string text, Stream stream, Pdf417EncodeOptions encodeOptions, MatrixOptions renderOptions)

members.name: SavePng
members.summary: Saves PDF417 PNG to a stream for byte payloads.
members.signature: static void SavePng(byte[] data, Stream stream, Pdf417EncodeOptions encodeOptions, MatrixOptions renderOptions)

members.name: SaveSvg
members.summary: Saves PDF417 SVG to a file.
members.signature: static string SaveSvg(string text, string path, Pdf417EncodeOptions encodeOptions, MatrixOptions renderOptions)

members.name: SaveSvgz
members.summary: Saves PDF417 SVGZ to a file for text payloads.
members.signature: static string SaveSvgz(string text, string path, Pdf417EncodeOptions encodeOptions, MatrixOptions renderOptions)

members.name: Save
members.summary:
Saves PDF417 to a file based on extension (.png/.svg/.svgz/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.ppm/.pbm/.pgm/.pam/.xbm/.xpm/.tga/.ico/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.
members.signature: static string Save(string text, string path, Pdf417EncodeOptions encodeOptions, MatrixOptions renderOptions, string title)

members.name: Save
members.summary:
Saves PDF417 to a file for byte payloads based on extension (.png/.svg/.svgz/.html/.jpg/.bmp/.ppm/.pbm/.pgm/.pam/.xbm/.xpm/.tga/.ico/.pdf/.eps).
 Defaults to PNG when no extension is provided.
members.signature: static string Save(byte[] data, string path, Pdf417EncodeOptions encodeOptions, MatrixOptions renderOptions, string title)
